properties.description:
Sabalan volcanic plateau, Ahar County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 205

Location: Iran

The area NW of Iran, immediately S of the border with Azerbaijan and W of the Caspian Sea, comprises a volcanic plateau, the southern margin of which is dominated by large Sabalan (Savalan) volcano. The plateau covers c. 15000kmÂ², while Sabalan extends...
